description: PURCHASE OF RECEPTION DESKS, INCLUDING DELIVERY AND INSTALLATION SERVICES FOR THREE RIVERS REGION
full_summary:
**Purchase of Reception Desks with Delivery and Installation Services**
===========================================================

### Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of reception desks with delivery and installation services for the Trois-Rivieres region, Quebec, Canada.

### Key Solicitation Details

* **Procurement Contract Number**: WS4458070341
* **Solicitation Date**: February 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 26, 2024 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Contract Value**: N/A
* **Procurement Methods**: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Procurement Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide the following services:
- Supply and delivery of reception desks
- Installation of reception desks at the specified site

### Selection Criteria

The contract award will be based on the lowest price.

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: March 26, 2024 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding the RFP, please contact:
Julie Carbonneau, SPAC/PSPC (elle-la / she-her)
Email: [julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Access to the RFP Documents

The RFP documents can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery portal at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18889978?extsite=MTg4ODk5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18889978?extsite=MTg4ODk5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Note:** The RFP document includes an Annex Statement of Requirement which outlines the full scope of the project.

The Entry has been rewritten to ensure accuracy and maintain clarity. Only relevant information has been included, and important details have been highlighted. The rewritten entry adheres to the 400-word limit.
